title: Virtual Simulation-Based Teacher Training Program for Behavior Management

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary educational theories and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Customized training program for current professionals, utilizing simulations that replicate real classroom scenarios in a virtual environment

learning_goals: Learners analyze diverse student behavior problem scenarios and select appropriate behavior management strategies with over 80% accuracy
Learners simulate real-time interactions with students in a virtual classroom environment and acquire effective communication skills through at least three iterations of repeated training.
Learners can achieve over 90% satisfaction ratings by revising strategies based on immediate feedback following the application of behavior management techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
